title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: March 21, 2023, 06:58:24 PMLast edit: March 25, 2023, 10:39:22 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night San AntonioMulti Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-vera-vs-sandhagen/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Marlon Vera vs. Cory Sandhagen12. Holly Holm vs. Yana Santos11. Nate Landwehr vs. Austin Lingo10. Maycee Barber vs. Andrea Lee9. Manel Kape vs. Alex Perez8. Albert Duraev vs. Chidi Njokuani(1 point each)7. Tucker Lutz vs. Daniel Pineda6. Lucas Alexander vs. Steven Peterson5. Trevin Giles vs. Preston Parsons4. Daniel Da Silva vs. CJ Vergara3. Trey Ogden vs. Manuel Torres2. Victor Altamirano vs. Vinicius Salvador1. Hailey Cowan vs. Tamires VidalHow many matches will NOT go the Full DistanceExample13. Marlon Vera 12. Holly Holm 11. Nate Landwehr10. Maycee Barber 9. Manel Kape 8. Albert Duraev 7. Tucker Lutz 6. Lucas Alexander 5. Trevin Giles 4. Daniel Da Silva 3. Trey Ogden 2. Victor Altamirano 1. Hailey Cowan NOT go the Full Distance 8(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
